meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle: Road Traffic (Breath Analysing Instruments, Screening Devices and Pre-screening Devices) Notice

section.name: s2
section.heading: Approved breath analysing instruments under section 39F(1)(a) of the Ordinance
section.content: The instruments described in Schedule 1 are approved as breath analysing instruments to analyse the proportion of alcohol in a specimen of a person’s breath.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Approved screening devices under section 39F(1)(b) of the Ordinance
section.content: The devices described in Schedule 2 are approved as screening devices for the purpose of indicating whether the proportion of alcohol in a person’s breath is likely to exceed the prescribed limit.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Approved pre-screening devices under section 39F(1)(c) of the Ordinance
section.content: The devices described in Schedule 3 are approved as pre-screening devices for indicating whether or not the proportion of alcohol in a person’s breath reaches such a level that it would be reasonable to suspect that such proportion is likely to exceed the prescribed limit.

section.name: s1
section.content: Alcotest 7110 manufactured by Dräger Safety AG & Co. KGaA, Lübeck, Germany.

section.name: s2
section.content: Alcotest 9510 manufactured by Dräger Safety AG & Co. KGaA, Lübeck, Germany.

section.name: s3
section.content: SAF’IR Evolution manufactured by Alcohol Countermeasure Systems Corp., Toronto, Canada. (L.N. 76 of 2020)

section.name: s2
section.content: Alcotest 6810 manufactured by Dräger Safety AG & Co. KGaA, Lübeck, Germany.

section.name: s3
section.content: Alcotest 6820 manufactured by Dräger Safety AG & Co. KGaA, Lübeck, Germany. (L.N. 63 of 2023)

section.name: s1
section.content: Lion Alcolmeter 500 manufactured by Lion Laboratories Limited, United Kingdom.
